Tech For You
Posted By Edgar James on 27/03/2020.

Technology has really come a long way from its first inention. We are now in the year 2020 where technology has become as important as the very air we breathe.Here at TechNewz we have selected the best gadgets for you to get this 2020.The list ranges from technology you can use at work to technology you can use at home and we haven't forgotten about the kids and so we've also made a tech list for them!!!

Inside A Camera
Posted By Edgar James on 27/03/2020.

A camera is an optical instrument used to record images. At their most basic, cameras are sealed boxes (the camera body) with a small hole (the aperture) that let light in to capture an image on a light-sensitive surface (usually photographic film or a digital sensor). A camera has many uses that range far and wide....
The list is here and as always here at TechNewz we have compiled a list for you!
